attributes.action: Nurses and Doctors deserve more than a handclap and a 1% payrise.
attributes.additional_details: The country all wants a real thank you for the NHS staff who gave their all  working under stress and fear to help their patients.
attributes.background: Reassess the paltry 1% payrise proposed for the NHS health workers. The country wants to offer its thanks in a real way. This 1% represents £6 a week payrise to a level 6 nurse- not even enough to cover the ridiculous parking charges they have to pay to go to work to serve us all.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Fund free parking for all NHS workers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560696
